title: SmartSound SonicFire Pro v5.0.2 [Darkman]
description:
-------------------------------
SONICFIRE PRO 5 SCORING EDITION
-------------------------------

Experience the creative power of turning the best library music into a fully-customized music score. Sonicfire Pro 5 Scoring Edition offers the most innovative set of features for adding high-impact music to any type of project. Its familiar timeline interface and intuitive access to SmartSoundÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s patented music editing features make it immediately rewarding for video and audio editors alike.


Windows Minimum System Requirements
-----------------------------------

Operating System: Vista compatible but requires a minimum of
                  Microsoft Windows XP SP1 or better

Processor:        Intel 1GHz Pentium processor or equivalent

Sound:            Sound card & Speakers

Optical Drive:    DVD Rom drive

RAM:              256 MB available RAM

Space:            50 MB hard disk space (minimum)

Media Players:    Windows Media Player 11 or newer.


Compatible Audio Formats
------------------------

Audio Interchange File Format - AIFF
MPEG layer 3 - MP3
SmartSound Audio File - SDS
SmartSound Audio Package - SSUP
WAVE form audio format - WAV


Compatible Video Formats
------------------------

AVI
MOV
MPEG - 1
WMV


Compatibility with Video Software
---------------------------------

SmartSound is compatible with any application software or system that imports
industry standard media file formats. 


--------
Install
--------

1. Unpack
2. Install
3. Run Sonicfire
4. Open keygen 
5. Select 'Scoring Edition' Type and click on 'Generate' button for proper serial.
6. In Registration window enter any Name and Company and use generated serial.


   EnjoY!!!


---------------------------------------------------
Special thx to Deepstatus.

=============----------------------------------------------------------------------

Cheers,

Darkman
